body_html:
I believe this is still an issue since there's still an extra copy and memory allocations when reading data with S3RandomAccessFile::Read():

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/s3/s3_file_system.cc#L191

Maybe @yongtang can confirm?
body_text:
I believe this is still an issue since there's still an extra copy and memory allocations when reading data with S3RandomAccessFile::Read():
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/s3/s3_file_system.cc#L191
Maybe @yongtang can confirm?
body:
I believe this is still an issue since there's still an extra copy and memory allocations when reading data with `S3RandomAccessFile::Read()`: 

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/s3/s3_file_system.cc#L191

Maybe @yongtang can confirm?
